site.title: Kima Academy - Program for Entrepreneurial Leadership Management (ELM)

hero.headline: Build Exceptional Leaders
hero.description: Kima Academy's Entrepreneurial Leadership Management program transforms corporate professionals into visionary leaders. Master Ivy League methodologies and accelerate your path to executive excellence.

philosophy.quote: Lead with Confidence. Build with Impact.
philosophy.subquote: A wise person learns from experience. A wiser one learns from others. What experience takes years to build, focused learning delivers now.

pillars.title: Three core pillars
pillars.intro: Our intensive Leadership Entrepreneurial Management program bridges the gap between potential and performance through three core pillars:
pillars.pillar1_desc: Leadership isn't inherited. It's built. Master frameworks and transition from manager to conscious leader.
pillars.pillar2_desc: Entrepreneurship is a mindset of creating value. Develop opportunity recognition and drive innovation in any context.
pillars.pillar3_desc: Your vision means nothing if you can't communicate it. Perfect storytelling, persuasion, and executive presence.

outcomes.heading: OUTCOMES & ELM
outcomes.gain_p1: KIMA ELM program doesn't just train. It transforms how you think and the way you drive change.
outcomes.gain_p2: Kima Academy accelerates your growth, turning ambition into execution, potential into results, and managers into leaders who create lasting value.
outcomes.benefit1: Practical tools and strategic frameworks developed by IVY-league schools while adapted to local culture
outcomes.benefit2: Confidence to make complex decisions from day one
outcomes.benefit3: Proven methodologies adapted for real-world challenges
outcomes.benefit4: A clear path from manager to impactful leader
outcomes.certified_p1: KIMA ELM program doesn't just train. It transforms how you think and the way you drive change.
outcomes.certified_p2: Kima Academy accelerates your growth, turning ambition into execution, potential into results, and managers into leaders who create lasting value.

levels.title: What is your next leadership Level?
levels.level1_subtitle: Shift from specialized to executive oversight
levels.level1_desc: Transition from being a subject matter expert to leading strategic organizational initiatives.
levels.level1_focus5: Mentor emerging talent in your field
levels.level2_subtitle: Move from team to enterprise leadership and strategic decision-making.
levels.level2_desc: Move from managing teams to enterprise-wide leadership and strategic decision-making.
levels.level3_subtitle: Advance to ultimate organizational responsibility and vision setting.
levels.level3_desc: Advance to ultimate organizational responsibility and vision setting.
levels.level4_desc: Transition from creating to leading, scaling your vision through others.
levels.level5_desc: Connect with our network of world-class accelerators and strategic partners to amplify your leadership journey.

modals.module1_p2: The world's top institutions—Harvard, MIT—have proven that leadership is a learnable skill. We bring their proven methodologies to you, adapted for real-world application.
modals.module1_item2: Decision-making under uncertainty and the 5 laws of leadership
modals.module1_item3: Building influence and driving organizational change
modals.module1_item4: Transitioning from manager to conscious leader
modals.module1_bottom: Bottom line: Lead with clarity, purpose, and measurable impact.
modals.module2_p1: Entrepreneurship isn't about startups. It's a mindset of creating value.
modals.module2_p2: True entrepreneurs see what others miss: the gap between problems and solutions. They diagnose challenges, spot opportunities, and mobilize resources whether building new ventures or driving innovation within existing organizations.
modals.module2_bottom: Bottom line: Think like an entrepreneur. Lead like a changemaker.
modals.module3_p1: Your vision means nothing if you can't communicate it.
modals.module3_p2: Professionalism is the bridge between ideas and execution. It's how you persuade stakeholders, attract partners, build credibility, and inspire action. It's the skill that transforms potential into performance.
modals.module3_bottom: Bottom line: Communicate with power. Execute with precision.
modals.program_modal1_subtitle: Shift from specialized expertise to executive oversight
modals.program_modal1_benefit3_desc: Join the KIMA LEM Leadership network
modals.accelerators_modal_desc: Connect with our network of world-class accelerators and strategic partners to amplify your leadership journey.

accelerate.title: Accelerate Your Ascent to Proactive Professional Leadership
accelerate.item1_desc: Mastering Ivy League methodologies and strategic business planning to build a solid leadership foundation.
accelerate.item2_desc: Develop insight to identify unique opportunities and innovative solutions, thinking outside the box.
accelerate.item3_desc: Translating theory into practice through guided exercises, collaborative projects, and real-world challenges supported by mentors.
accelerate.item4_title: Preparation for the Highest Executive Level
accelerate.item4_desc: Gaining the confidence, experience, and essential network for success at the executive management level, whether launching a new project or expanding an existing one.

elm_program.title: ELM -Mini Program
elm_program.description: Transform your leadership journey with our comprehensive mini program. Everything you need to accelerate your growth.
elm_program.location_text: Herzliya, an inspiring tech environment designed to foster creativity and focused learning
elm_program.investment_note: Comprehensive training including all external sessions, personal mentoring, and program materials
elm_program.outcome_text: Advancing to executive leadership level, equipped to build and expand successful ventures
elm_program.startdate_schedule: Meetings twice a month on Monday.
elm_program.tagline: Don't let lack of experience hold you back. Your entrepreneurial journey starts here.
elm_program.cta_title: Kima Academy Program for Entrepreneurial Leadership Management

hubspot_modal.title: Enroll in ELM Program
hubspot_modal.p2: Fill out the form below to secure your spot in our Entrepreneurial Leadership Management program.

footer.company_desc: Our mission is to empowers businesses off our all size too thrive in an businesses ever changing marketplaces.
